SpeechRecognitionAlternative.summary: The SpeechRecognitionAlternative interface of the Web Speech API represents a single word that has been recognized by the speech recognition service.

SpeechRecognitionAlternativeTranscript.summary:
The transcript read-only property of the
interface returns a string containing the
transcript of the recognized word(s).

remarks.para:
For continuous recognition, leading or trailing whitespace will be included where
necessary so that concatenation of consecutive s
produces a proper transcript of the session.

SpeechRecognitionAlternativeConfidence.summary:
The confidence read-only property of the
interface returns a numeric estimate of how
confident the speech recognition system is that the recognition is correct.

blockquote.para:
Mozilla's implementation of confidence is still
being worked on â€” at the moment, it always seems to return 1.
